Reviews.Title: Very good laptop.
Reviews.Author: Hunter
Reviews.Content: Touching Screen with windows 8 is an interesting experiences. It's hard to find a strong laptop like this with over 400 bulks. Design is very good, smoothy.. Keyboard is very soft and easy to type. Touchpad is okay. There is no doubt with this system, but I wish the storage is larger (1TB is better for my demand). For someone need a strong laptop, you can see here (The price will higer a little bit).B00F9VPHGC

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this laptop
Reviews.Author: Sue Baughman
Reviews.Content: I ordered this on a Thursday and received it the next day  It is easy to start up and I have found it easy learn my way around both the touch screen and Windows 8 . I had a technician help me with security and he told me this laptop is a very good buy.  I recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: This laptop is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Mary Canterberry
Reviews.Content: I'm am not the greatest user around & have found this laptop to be extremely user friendly. Just what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba satellite
Reviews.Author: technewb
Reviews.Content: Got it for my sister who lives in another state since her 3yrs old intel celeron laptop is overheating and so far she loves it. I have not personally seen or played with this laptop but so far its the greatest laptop she has ever owned according to my sis. I got it while it was on sale, $467.72 tax included and it was the cheapest touch screen with I-3 cpu i could find anywhere. She will be mainly using it for college,web browsing, streaming movies. She would recommend this laptop!!!

Reviews.Title: In Heaven!
Reviews.Author: L. Meyers "coffeelover"
Reviews.Content: Just got my new laptop today and so far I love it. It was crazy easy to set up and begin using. The Windows 8 OS was easy to configure and figure out. I'll update as things come up but so far I'd highly recommend this computer.

Reviews.Title: Great machine for the price
Reviews.Author: Philip Tormanen
Reviews.Content: It works well and is a great machine for the price.  Fast enough cpu for basic web browsing, word, powerpoint & excel.

Reviews.Title: Good mid priced machine
Reviews.Author: Fodder
Reviews.Content: Wanted a laptop with HDMI out, an optical drive and a half decent cpu .Hard drives and memory are easily upgraded down the road.  Never really used windows 8 or a laptop with a touchscreen before as my last one was windows 7, so after checking them out and being happy with my last mid priced machine, also a Toshiba, this one looked about right. It works great, windows 8.1 was about an hour of learning curve and I am also happy I paid a little extra for the touchscreen version. Swiping, dragging and selecting have never been easier. Its fast, quiet and well put together. Battery life is also good. Windows 8 was a breeze to get up and running despite all the bad press. I guess its because people do not give themselves time to figure it out, it is a massive difference from any previous windows. I personally applaud Microsoft for making an OS for modern machines that is fast, slick, less resource hungry, stable and secure.Does all I expected of it and more. Money well spent for me.Update. Still working great 6 months later, but internet explorer 11 which comes installed on this machine is a very hit and miss affair. Would just hang up web pages and stop altogether on a regular basis. Installed google chrome as my default browser, now harmony is restored.

Reviews.Title: Love the computer - Windows 8 on the other hand...
Reviews.Author: James Kennedy
Reviews.Content: I needed a fairly inexpensive computer as I'm back in graduate school.  I needed a computer that would allow me to type documents as well as access class web sites and this computer does a great job.Windows 8 was a pain to understand initially.  It's working a bit better now though...

Reviews.Title: poor battery life,,
Reviews.Author: greg
Reviews.Content: battery died after three months after purchase,,good product but didn't expect short battery life,,,now i got to buy a replacement battery,,,

Reviews.Title: Like my new computer
Reviews.Author: ML
Reviews.Content: I am still learning about my new computer but I really like the versatility of using touch or keyboard functions.

Reviews.Title: Touch Screen Digitizer Quality Lacking
Reviews.Author: Leslie Burks
Reviews.Content: Love the touchscreen but the quality is VERY lacking.  We dropped it and cracked the touch screen digitizer.  Which is part of life.  Purchased the replacement for $200 from toshiba parts.  Outrageous!  This screen is so thin it cannot be installed without cracking it.  I was very cautious!  The screen replacement is a fairly simple process but with the lacking quality of the screen I don't see how it is possible to replace without damaging new screen.  We will not purchase another touch screen.  Too bad as it is a great feature but the quality must be improved to make it a usable product.  Dropping it I expected it to crack I was not shocked by that.  I didn't expect the touch screen to withstand what other laptops can.  But not being able to replace it is absurd.  The quality needs work I'm disappointed.
